Question: Sir James ****, MBE (born 18 June 1942) is an English musician, singer, songwriter, multi-instrumentalist and composer.
Hints: This person initially owned 20% of Northern Songs, which became 15% after a public stock offering in 1965.
On 31 October 1956, when this person was fourteen, his mother died of an embolism.
On the eve of the 2012 U.S Presidential Election, this person issued a video endorsement of President Barack Obama.
